name: D
caption: Demand Rate
message: Demand rate must be strictly positive. Use the same time unit as the production rate.

name: p
caption: Production rate
message: Production rate must be must be larger than demand rate.

name: A
caption: Setup cost
message: Setup cost must be strictly positive.

name: h
caption: Unit holding cost
message: Unit holding cost per unit of time must be strictly positive.

name: r
caption: Resumption cost
message: Resumption cost must be strictly positive.

name: m
caption: Corrective maintenance cost
message: Corrective maintenance cost must be strictly positive.

name: mu
caption: Mean of the Exponential distribution
message: Mean of the exponential distribution must be strictly positive.
